message:
If you are in the New York City area on Thursday, June 1st, check out I AM STILL HERE at The People's Film Festival in Harlem, NY! The movie sheds light on the crisis of child trafficking in the U.S. It will also be showing at the New Jersey International Film Festival on June 11th.
#IAmStillHere #HelpERASE #ChildTrafficking

data.description: Join us in Harlem, NY June 1st for the opening of the @thepeoplesfilmfestival! Ticket purchase includes entrance to the after party so get your ticket now: www.thepeoplesfilmfestival.com
data.title: Timeline Photos
